content: times if sm0 bothers you while doing the decreases move it to the stitches right before or after the decreases stitches decreases are now complete you should have 128 136 147 154 164 180 sts on your needles work rounds in stockinette until your work measures 35 38 44 47 50 53 cm 14 15 17 1/4 18 1/2 20 21 measured from the cast on edge in the back panel or until desired length keep in mind that you ll have to add 5cm 2 inches of ribbing change to 5mm needles to work the ribbing r8 repeat *p1 k3* across the entire row repeat r8 in the round until ribbing measures 5cm 2 approximately 15 row bind off using the icelandic bind off method the body is now complete sleeves using 6mm needles with 40cm cable or using the magic loop method pick up the 48 52 57 62 68 74 sts left on hold place a stitch marker round marker and pick up 8 8 11 12 12 12 sts in the underarm making it a total of 56 60 68 74 80 86 sts on your needles work in stockinette in the round for 5 cm 2 change to 5mm needles to work the ribbing r9 repeat *p1 k3* across the entire row repeat r9 in the round until ribbing measures 3cm 1 1/4 approximately 9 row bind off using the icelandic bind off method repeat for the other sleeve your sleeves are now complete collar using 5mm needles pick up 64 64 64 68 68 68 sts from your cast on edge with a pick up rate of approximately 3sts out of 4 sts we ll now work the ribbing © 2025 manon lefeuvre all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only do not reproduce distribute or sell the pattern or finished items made from it without permission r10 repeat *p1 k3* across the entire row repeat r10 in the round until ribbing measures 6cm 2 1/4 approximately 18 row bind off using the icelandic bind off method notes picture sample is a size xs knitted with lang cloud yarn colorway 10 please note that i was between sizes s and xs and chose to size down also please note that sizes l and xl have been modified after the testknit to make it less oversize feel free ton contact me by email eatyroufiberzz@gmail com or on my ravelry if you encounter any issue © 2025 manon lefeuvre all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only do not reproduce distribute or sell the pattern or finished items made from it without permission testers amazing work romane/ @ymor dis knitted in size l using lang yarns cloud colorway 12 cyndelle / @llycende_ knitted size xl lang yarns cloud colorway 10 © 2025 manon lefeuvre all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only do not reproduce distribute or sell the pattern or finished items made from
